author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CBIZ Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.08 From Continuing Operations
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - CBIZ Inc:
* CBIZ REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.08 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 9.1 PERCENT TO $195.1 MILLION * SEES ‍2018 GROWTH IN TOTAL REVENUE WITHIN A RANGE OF 5% TO 8%​
* IN 2018, CO EXPECTS TO ACHIEVE GROWTH IN FULLY DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE WITHIN RANGE OF 13% TO 17% OVER $0.92 REPORTED FOR 2017​
* CBIZ - IN 2018 EPS ADJUSTED FOR ONE-TIME 2017 IMPACT OF TCJA , EXPECTS TO ACHIEVE GROWTH IN RANGE OF 20% TO 24% OVER ADJUSTED $0.87 REPORTED FOR 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
